javax.speech.synthesis
Interface SynthesizerListener

All Superinterfaces:
EngineListener, SpeechEventListener
public interface SynthesizerListener
extends EngineListener

The listener interface for receiving notification of SynthesizerEvents associated with a Synthesizer. SynthesizerListener objects are attached to and removed from a Synthesizer by calling the addSynthesizerListener and removeSynthesizerListener methods.

The source for all SynthesizerEvents provided to a SynthesizerListener is the Synthesizer.

See Also:
Synthesizer, SynthesizerEvent, addSynthesizerListener, removeSynthesizerListener

Method Summary
 void synthesizerUpdate(SynthesizerEvent e)
          Method called back to indicate a Synthesizer event update.
